name: weathers
readme:
weathers

every other weather npm was tragic so I rolled my own [its so simple]

  
    npm install weathers

    --

    var weathers = require('weathers');

    weather.getWeather(lat, lng, function(err, data){
     ~~ do awesome stuff! ~~
    });
